reviewText: Excellent service, honest descriptions, fast delivery, great deal!
The underlying stories are stunning and these videos tell them well.  I couldn't get through either one without tears.  It's nice to know these examples of God's servants really exist.

Each dvd goes through the life of a Christian who have been persecuted for their faith. Wonderfully told and illustrated. My kids loved these and watch them over and over. Great dvds for building your families faith. A good buy and well worth the investment.
